name: Aztlán
declaringWar: Let the red flood rise and spread, drowning everything in its path!
attacked: You mean to subjugate us like the conquistadors, or worse. But I won't let that dark future come to pass. Now die!
defeated: I only ever did what was necessary for my people to survive. But it wasn't enough...
introduction: I am the Great Speaker Yesenia, descendant of the Lifebringer who reestablished the mighty nation of Aztlán, and the savior of its people. I wonder, will you sacrifice as much as I have...?
tradeRequest: The consequences for refusing this deal will be quite severe.
uniqueText: Defeating military units and conquering cities provides a unique resource which can be used to transform Jaguar and Eagle Warriors into stronger units. All units receive a 30% combat bonus against City-States, earn Culture equal to the strength of enemy units killed, and have a 25% chance to capture enemy units and earn 25 Water. Start with Iron Working researched.
uniques: When defeating a [{Military} {Land}] unit, earn [25] Gold and recruit it <with [25]% chance>
